talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Farm Manager Mori${action:Talk}
All harvests will be automatically stored in the [Farm Warehouse],
If you wish to retrieve your harvested crops, feel free to drop by the Crop Management Centre!

$Farm Manager Mori${action:Talk}
The Warehouse is full of freshly harvested crops!
Hehehe~With the increase in hardworking farmers, the lands will definitely be more fertile~Haha!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>[Farm]<FONT color=#086171>Area to sow seeds to grow crops</FONT></html>
<html>[Fish]<FONT color=#086171>From tomorrow onwards, I will be the Fishing King</FONT></html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Farm Manager Mori${action:Talk}
This can be considered as Saint Haven's dining table,
helping me is akin to enriching everyone's dining table.

$Farm Manager Mori$
The process to cultivate crops can be divided into [Sowing Seeds], [Nurturing] and [Harvesting].

$Farm Manager Mori$
[Sowing seeds] can only be done on the empty plots in the farmlands under the Farm Management.

$Farm Manager Mori$
To sow seeds, left-click on the empty plot then chooseSelectto pick the type of seeds you want to sow. Sowing is thus complete.

$Farm Manager Mori$
However, it is not over yet, we have to carry out the [Nurturing] process next.

$Farm Manager Mori$
To fish, bring your fishing rod and bait to the Farm's Fishing Pond and use your Fishing skills.
Fishing skills can be found in the Supporting Skills section in Skills [K].

$Farm Manager Mori$
Your comprehension ability is pretty strong!
Once you begin to fish, the bar at the top of the screen, which indicates Time Depleted, will gradually fill up.
Once the bar is full, right-click to catch the hooked fish. All fishes caught can be viewed in your storage.

$Farm Manager Mori$
Hehehe! For those who are more impatient, there is still a method to quicken the process!
Beneath the Time Depleted bar, there is a Energy barÔºÅ
When the bar fills up to the mid-point, left-click to reduce the time needed to fish.

$Farm Manager Mori$
This means that if you click at the right time, the process of catching a fish speeds up.
If you have difficulties, open the [Operations Guide] for a better understanding.

$Farm Manager Mori$
To cook, you will need [Cooking Tools], [Recipes] and the required [Ingredients].

$Farm Manager Mori$
[Cooking Tools] can be bought in the Shop.
However, do note that different cuisines will require different types of [Cooking Tools].

$Farm Manager Mori$
[Recipes] can be found in reward boxes obtained from completing trials. Just use [Add Cuisine] to add the [Recipes] acquired into [Cuisines] which can be found in the Supporting Skills section in Skills [K].

$Farm Manager Mori$
In terms of[Ingredients], do note that different recipes will need different [Ingredients].
[Ingredients] can be obtained from Fishing and Cultivation,
thus if you wish to cook, you must learn Fishing and Cultivation too.

$Farm Manager Mori$
After adding recipes and if you have the Cooking Tools and Ingredients ready,
select the recipe which you wish to cook and click the
[Food Production] button to start cooking.

$Farm Manager Mori$
Do note that if you do not have the required quantity of Ingredients, you will not be able to finish cooking.
Are you able to understand the deep and intricate world of cooking now?!
